item.title: NatsuLion Version 1.2
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 1.2

Improvement

  • [NTLN-118] - New Toolbar icons! Friends and Sent icons has been contributed by @epytwen
  • [NTLN-176] - To avoid timeout caused by Twitter's overload, now NatsuLion wait 30 seconds until timeout

item.title: NatsuLion Version 1.1
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 1.1

Improvement

  • [NTLN-171] - smaller line spacing (thanks @takuma104)

New Feature

  • [NTLN-172] - word filter feature (thanks @mootoh for the patch http://blog.deadbeaf.org/2008/05/01/hack-natsulion-to-filter-messages/)

Task

  • [NTLN-173] - new app icon

item.title: NatsuLion Version 1.0
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 1.0

Bug

  • [NTLN-52] - password should not be required when the user changes username at account info panel
  • [NTLN-159] - changing account is not applied immediately (restart needed)
  • [NTLN-162] - need to change the filter predicate for "sent" view along with user switch

Improvement

  • [NTLN-161] - need better mouse over effect for icon

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.34
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.34

Bug

  • [NTLN-160] - message disappears just after press enter key in input field

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.33
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.33

Bug

  • [NTLN-137] - input text field does not change its background color when over 140 characters are input
  • [NTLN-157] - Some Japanese resource is not applied (view naems, ...)

Improvement

  • [NTLN-151] - want Dock icon!

Task

  • [NTLN-156] - [Refactoring] make TwitterStatus deprecated (move to NTLNMessage)

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.32
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.32

Bug

  • [NTLN-47] - An error message is sometimes shown twice

Improvement

  • [NTLN-85] - better error handling using http status code
  • [NTLN-87] - don't repeat the same error messages
  • [NTLN-93] - omit duplicate error messages
  • [NTLN-150] - need internationalization work for all messages (at first English and Japanese support)
  • [NTLN-152] - make "show <3 as heart" not configurable (always do so)
  • [NTLN-155] - reflect ctrl+enter for POST setting to the placeholder text of the message input field

New Feature

  • [NTLN-153] - make autoscroll configurable

Task

  • [NTLN-148] - refactoring constant names
  • [NTLN-154] - build incremental i18nize environment

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.31
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.31

Bug

  • [NTLN-123] - wired white border in message input field
  • [NTLN-143] - NTLNMessageInputTextField does not release NSColor at changing color scheme

Improvement

  • [NTLN-139] - better Growl notifications
  • [NTLN-144] - no message area is not drawn by trasparent color
  • [NTLN-145] - menu bar should not be highlighted when press j, k

New Feature

  • [NTLN-146] - ability to increase transparency when inactivated

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.30
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.30

Bug

  • [NTLN-142] - crash when change color scheme

Improvement

  • [NTLN-141] - use graphical indicator to show timeline speed

New Feature

  • [NTLN-136] - new feture to change fonts

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.29
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.29

Improvement

  • [NTLN-130] - freeze at arriving new messages cont. (NTLN-128)

New Feature

  • [NTLN-134] - summarize Growl notifications when a lot of notifications
  • [NTLN-135] - ability to know the number of messages post

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.28
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.28

Bug

  • [NTLN-131] - not displayed tweet is made unread
  • [NTLN-133] - unread count badge switches 0 and 1 frequently at a boot time

Improvement

  • [NTLN-129] - count only unread replies for the badge
  • [NTLN-132] - "view mode" toolbar text does not work when text only mode

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.27
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.27

Improvement

  • [NTLN-127] - slow when clicking a tweet with a lot of tweets in the view
  • [NTLN-128] - freeze at arriving new messages

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.26
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.26

Improvement

  • [NTLN-125] - need shortcuts

New Feature

  • [NTLN-126] - post with control + enter

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.25
item.description:
Bug

  • [NTLN-119] - number of new message on the badge is not updated when new message
  • [NTLN-120] - lack of read mark for light color scheme

Improvement

  • [NTLN-124] - star image update

New Feature

  • [NTLN-41] - Emphasize newly arrived messages
  • [NTLN-121] - Unread tab
  • [NTLN-122] - mark all as read feature

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.24
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.24

Bug

  • [NTLN-115] - crash on sending message
  • [NTLN-116] - refresh interval value is not shown
  • [NTLN-117] - not applicable messages are shown in "replies" tab when new message arrived

Improvement

  • [NTLN-109] - hide replies shown at the previouse runtime

New Feature

  • [NTLN-71] - download replies at startup

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.23
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.23

Improvement

  • [NTLN-112] - move Refresh menu item under View menu
  • [NTLN-113] - add version number to the plist file

New Feature

  • [NTLN-108] - provide dark color scheme
  • [NTLN-114] - display <3 as a heart mark

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.22
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.22

Bug

  • [NTLN-111] - only show 1 message at the boot time and stop

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.21
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.21

Bug

  • [NTLN-105] - duplicated message can be added when selected filtered view

Improvement

  • [NTLN-77] - hide the progress indicator for updating timeline.
  • [NTLN-102] - refactoring connection callbacks
  • [NTLN-104] - need View specific colors
  • [NTLN-106] - add menu for message view
  • [NTLN-107] - better progress indicator
  • [NTLN-110] - make setting "always expand message to show all text" non-configurable (enabled only)

New Feature

  • [NTLN-86] - ability to refresh tweets manually
  • [NTLN-103] - switchable message view

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.20
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.20

Bug

  • [NTLN-35] - the background color of the message area changes to "not-focused-on-window" color when select some text in it
  • [NTLN-43] - whole text does not appears even when message field is expanded

Improvement

  • [NTLN-101] - refactoring (introduce class name prefix, ...)

New Feature

  • [NTLN-100] - ability to configure window alpha

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.19
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.19

Improvement

  • [NTLN-18] - keep focus on the message input field
  • [NTLN-74] - enable auto scroll only if the newest message is shown
  • [NTLN-83] - better focus management after clicking icon

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.18
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.18

New Feature

  • [NTLN-99] - allow POST for timeline

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.16
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.16

Improvement

  • [NTLN-97] - star mark behavior improvement

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.15
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.15

Bug

  • [NTLN-92] - NatsuLion does not retrieve just after input username/password at the first startup
  • [NTLN-95] - descending sort order is not working

New Feature

  • [NTLN-91] - add/remove to favorite feature

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.14
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.14

Improvement

  • [NTLN-88] - slow at new message arrival

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.13
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.13

Bug

  • [NTLN-80] - window width calculation is wrong

Improvement

  • [NTLN-85] - better error handling using http status code

Task

  • [NTLN-84] - code improvement: make a stub of Twitter to make tests easier

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.12
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.12

Bug

  • [NTLN-81] - hang with "attempt to insert nil value"
  • [NTLN-82] - cannot post + (plus)

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.11
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.11

Improvement

  • [NTLN-72] - look and feel improvement: make status bar thin
  • [NTLN-76] - permit narrower width
  • [NTLN-78] - emphasize image while mouse is on
  • [NTLN-79] - ) should not be regarded as a part of URL

New Feature

  • [NTLN-55] - "message always expanded" feature

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.10
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.10

Bug

  • [NTLN-60] - 0.8 is too slow and its memory footprint is too large
  • [NTLN-67] - timeline request is issued every time refresh interval spinner is clicked
  • [NTLN-69] - mouse cursor remains as the pointing type even after leaving name or timestamp field

Improvement

  • [NTLN-63] - swap screenname and username's location
  • [NTLN-68] - display once if name and screenname is the same

New Feature

  • [NTLN-62] - clickable area is too large [clickable link to a user's timeline page (http://twitter.com/)]
  • [NTLN-64] - link to status page

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.8
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.8

Improvement

  • [NTLN-53] - 2nd try - reconsider colors

New Feature

  • [NTLN-51] - ability to configure the sort order of the messages
  • [NTLN-58] - link for reply

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.7
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.7

Bug

  • [NTLN-48] - some code improvements told on Twitter
  • [NTLN-50] - < and > are shown as < and >

New Feature

  • [NTLN-16] - skip a Growl notification just after launched
  • [NTLN-39] - inform entered text length in a status bar

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.6
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.6

Bug

  • [NTLN-45] - automatic update fails because Sparkle does not handle localized application name well

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.5
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version Alpha (0.5)

Bug

  • [NTLN-42] - cannot send message text after & charcter

Improvement

  • [NTLN-44] - better colors and links

New Feature

  • [NTLN-25] - display errors
    • <

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.4
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.4

Notice

From this version, NatsuLion uses keychain to store user's password (NTLN-12). Then the password stored in your plist is no longer needed. So, please remove plist file sitting at $HOME/Library/Preferences/net.physalis.NatsuLion.plist and then launch NatsuLion.

Bug

  • [NTLN-32] - convert entity reference to a normal character in the message view

Improvement

  • [NTLN-7] - expand a message row to show its whole message text if truncated

New Feature

  • [NTLN-3] - make @ a link to the page of user
  • [NTLN-12] - store user passwords in his keychain
  • [NTLN-20] - make refresh interval configurable
  • [NTLN-37] - configuration wizard like feature for the first time launched
  • [NTLN-38] - change sort order to ascending

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.3
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.3

Bug

  • [NTLN-30] - message input field remains expanded after sending a message

Improvement

  • [NTLN-29] - better mouse cursor style when hovering over unhighlighted messages

New Feature

  • [NTLN-2] - need clickable URL feature
  • [NTLN-26] - need a feature to warn a message input length is over 140 and 160
  • [NTLN-33] - Japanese localized application name
  • [NTLN-36] - clickable link to a user's timeline page (http://twitter.com/)

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.2
item.description:
Bug

  • [NTLN-23] - not appropriate row is highlighted when a selected row moves

New Feature

  • [NTLN-28] - color reply message

item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.1
item.description:
• [NTLN-4] - auto resizing textfield for message input
  • [NTLN-6] - improve the way of selecting a message
  • [NTLN-24] - auto-update feature
